page.title: 02The Vicar of Hadley 1985
page.content: Population increases have meant that each parish priest has a larger territory to cover and a greater number of souls to care for{. When{Holy Trinity Church}was built in 1856,its minister,Rev.James Barton, had 1200 parishoners.Since then Hadley has expanded and Leegomery has been built so that there are now 9000 people in the parish. The present vicar,Rev.Maurice Young, an army officer for 30 yrs.,was ordained at the age of 50.This pattern is becoming more common. With high numbers,much of the vicar's time is spent on baptisms,marriages and deaths_rituals still in demand in a largely post-Christian era. Regular Church adherents number about 150 with 60 to 70 attending main services on Sunday mornings.
